import React from "react"; import "../styles.css"; import Base from "./Base"; import ImageHelper from "./helper/Image"; import { loadcart } from './helper/Carthelper' export default function Shoppingcart() { const [products,setProducts]=useState([]) useEffect(()=> { setProducts(loadcart()); },[]) return (

Shopping Cart

{products.map((product,index)=>(

Apple Juice

250ml

+
1
-
$2.99
Remove
) )}
Sub-Total
2 items
$6.18
); }
